snippet.title: Ys Chronicles II - Official mobile Trailer (iOS & Android)
snippet.description:
After a hard fight to recover the six sacred books in Ys Chronicles I, Adol is back for a sequel! 

Ys II is an action-packed, heroic fantasy JRPG game that immerses you in a beautiful Japanese artistic universe. Featuring an epic, enchanting soundtrack, a rich, poetic atmosphere with beautiful artistic direction, and a deep story, Ys II uses the same “BUMP” system as its predecessor, requiring you to attack enemies by pouncing on them. This fighting style equates to more intuitive, more dynamic touch gameplay! 

Now available on:
- iPhone/iPad : https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1033229197
- Android : http://bit.ly/1J6NzfR

© Nihon Falcom Corporation. All rights reserved. 
© 2016 DotEmu SAS, All rights reserved
